io.elegie.luchess.web.framework.routing.pathbased

Class PathBasedRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.web.framework.routing.pathbased.PathBasedRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Router

    public class PathBasedRouter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Router
    This router will automatically match a controller name from the path info, capitalizing at each path part, and appending a controller suffix. For instance, a path like "/books/list" will be translated into "BooksListController", with a suffix being equal to "Controller".
